name: Catwalk (Sir.Daniel, Tamatsu, carotte98, GrinseJacky, steven-vd)
description:
Play together with your friends in a fast paced cat fashion contest! Find the most fitting clothing for the theme, out-dress your competition and get as many upvotes as possible! Featuring over 25 different clothes to choose from, 8 different player skins and the ability to write down your own themes!

Controls

WASD - Move
E or Space - Pick up clothing
Q - Drop Clothing

Credits

Programming - https://steven-vd.itch.io/ 
Programming  - https://itch.io/profile/sirdaniel
Programming and SFX - https://tamatsu.itch.io/
Art - https://itch.io/profile/grinsejacky
Art - https://itch.io/profile/carotte98
In association with Lycée des Arts et Métiers BTS - GP and BTS - AG
